scripts.build: expo build:web && rm -rf ../../static/app-name && mkdir -p ../../static/app-name && mv -i web-build/index.html web-build/index && mv -uf web-build/* ../../static/app-name
scripts.build-all: expo build && rm -rf ../../static/app-name && mkdir -p ../../static/app-name && mv -i web-build/index.html web-build/index && mv -uf web-build/* ../../static/app-name
